perk_absorption_fields.name: Absorption Fields
perk_absorption_fields.description: Reduces most incoming damage to this unit, scaling up as damage increases. Specifically: reduces 40% of any damage taken after 2; after all other damage reduction has been applied.

perk_acid_spit.name: Acid Spit
perk_acid_spit.description: Spit acid at long range, causing a noxious cloud to remain briefly on the battlefield.

perk_acidic.name: Acidic
perk_acidic.description: For Chryssalids and Zombies, apply Acid to enemies hit with melee attacks. For Thin Men, on death, leave an acid cloud on the battlefield. Unit is also immune to Acid attacks and effects.

perk_adaptive_bone_marrow.name: Adaptive Bone Marrow
perk_adaptive_bone_marrow.description: Regenerate wounds. For humans, wound recovery time is reduced by 66% (stacks with Advanced Surgery), and unit regenerates 2 hp every turn up to the HP max without armor.

perk_adrenaline_surge.name: Adrenaline Surge
perk_adrenaline_surge.description: Confers +10 Aim and +10% critical chance if this unit is wounded. The effects last for the remainder of the mission even if the unit is healed.

perk_adrenal_neurosympathy.name: Adrenal Neurosympathy
perk_adrenal_neurosympathy.description: Overloads the soldiers adrenal glands: when a kill is confirmed the soldier emits pheromones that grant offensive benefits to all nearby squad mates. Cannot be used more than once every 5 turns.

perk_advanced_fire_control.name: Advanced Fire Control
perk_advanced_fire_control.description: Shots from Overwatch no longer suffer any Aim penalty.

perk_aggression.name: Aggression
perk_aggression.description: Confers +10% critical chance per enemy in sight (max +30%). Aliens visible via squadsight are not counted for bonus.

perk_automated_threat_assessment.name: Automated Threat Assessment
perk_automated_threat_assessment.description: Confers 0.5 DR (50% chance to absorb one point of damage) at all times, and confers +15 defense when in overwatch until the unit takes an overwatch shot.

perk_battle_scanner.name: Battle Scanner
perk_battle_scanner.description: Scanning device that, when thrown, creates a new source of vision for 2 turns. Grants 2 uses. Increases throw range for battle scanners by 70% (does not stack with other perks).

perk_bioelectric_skin.name: Bioelectric Skin
perk_bioelectric_skin.description: The soldier projects an electric field from his or her skin, revealing but not alerting nearby enemies, and is immune to strangulation.

perk_blood_call.name: Blood Call
perk_blood_call.description: Unleash a bestial roar that inspires nearby allies of the same species to greater speed, focus, and resolve for 3 turns. 4 turn cooldown.

perk_bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
perk_bloodlust.description: Allows the Berserker to charge an enemy that wounds it.

perk_body_shield.name: Body Shield
perk_body_shield.description: The nearest visible enemy suffers -20 Aim against this unit and cannot critically hit it.

perk_bombard.name: Bombard
perk_bombard.description: Throw or launch grenades over exceptionally long distances (+50%).

perk_bring_em_on.name: Bring 'Em On
perk_bring_em_on.description: Confers 1-4 bonus damage during critical hits (which is then multiplied by 50% due to the critical hit). The damage is higher when more enemies are in view (including squad sight vision). This results in +1.5 dmg for 1-2 enemies, +3 dmg for 3-4 enemies, +4.5 dmg for 5-6 enemies, +6 dmg for 7 or more enemies.

perk_bull_rush.name: Bull Rush
perk_bull_rush.description: Charge towards an enemy to make a melee attack. Breaks nearby cover.

perk_cannon_fire.name: Cannon Fire
perk_cannon_fire.description: Beam attack that causes high damage and grants free Overwatch. If the Sectopod does not move, Cannon Fire can be used twice (against different enemies).

perk_chryssalid_spawn.name: Chryssalid Spawn
perk_chryssalid_spawn.description: If a Zombie has been implanted with Chryssalid Eggs, they hatch into a Chryssalid after 3 turns if the Zombie host is not killed.

perk_close_combat_specialist.name: Close Combat Specialist
perk_close_combat_specialist.description: Confers a reaction shot against any enemy who closes to within 4 tiles. Does not require Overwatch. Warning: Will activate even if unit is concealed.

perk_close_encounters.name: Close Encounters
perk_close_encounters.description: The first standard shot made within 4 tiles of the target does not cost an action. Cannot combine with Run And Gun.

perk_cluster_bomb.name: Cluster Bomb
perk_cluster_bomb.description: Mark a large area, and after one turn, saturate it with a barrage of explosive mini-bombs.

perk_collateral_damage.name: Collateral Damage
perk_collateral_damage.description: Area of effect attack that destroys most cover and hits all eligible targets for 1/3rd damage. Unlike most abilities, damage increasing items and perks also only apply 1/3rd damage (note: HEAT and flak cannot be reduced below +2 damage though). This attack cannot critically hit. Shredder ammo and holo-targeting are NOT applied.

perk_combat_drugs.name: Combat Drugs
perk_combat_drugs.description: Smoke grenades confer +20 Will and +20% critical chance in addition to the original 20 defense. The area of effect is also increased by 25%.

perk_combined_arms.name: Combined Arms
perk_combined_arms.description: Ignore one point of the enemy's damage reduction. For officers, this ability is provided to the entire squad.

perk_concealment.name: Concealment
perk_concealment.description: When the soldier moves to high cover, enemies without special capabilities will not target the soldier (but CAN sense him/her). Does not work if any enemies have line of sight to the soldier's starting position. Leaving cover, being flanked, firing, hacking arrays, and capturing meld will break this concealment. Low Profile units will not gain this bonus by occupying low cover. Firing from concealment grants +30% crit.

perk_covering_fire.name: Covering Fire
perk_covering_fire.description: Allows certain reaction shots to trigger on many enemy actions, not just movement (excludes reload, overwatch, and hunker down actions).

perk_damage_control.name: Damage Control
perk_damage_control.description: When this unit takes damage, all further damage will be reduced by 1 or 2 points (1.5 DR) for the next 2 turns.

perk_damn_good_ground.name: Damn Good Ground
perk_damn_good_ground.description: Confers +10 Aim and +10 Defense against enemies at lower elevation, in addition to the usual elevation bonuses.

perk_danger_zone.name: Danger Zone
perk_danger_zone.description: Increases area of effect of Suppression, rockets, grenade launchers and proximity mine launchers.

perk_death_blossom.name: Death Blossom
perk_death_blossom.description: Project an intense energy field from Closed position, damaging all nearby enemies.

perk_death_explosion.name: Death Explosion
perk_death_explosion.description: Explode on death, damaging everything in a small radius.

perk_dense_smoke.name: Dense Smoke
perk_dense_smoke.description: Increases the defense bonus from smoke grenade from 20 to 40.

perk_depth_perception.name: Depth Perception
perk_depth_perception.description: Height Advantage confers an additional +5 Aim and +5 critical chance.

perk_disabling_shot.name: Disabling Shot
perk_disabling_shot.description: Allows sniper rifles to fire a shot that causes the target's main weapon to malfunction. The target may use Reload to fix the weapon. 2 turn cooldown. Cannot cause critical hits.

perk_double_tap.name: Double Tap
perk_double_tap.description: Allows a second action restricted to Standard Shot, Precision Shot, or Disabling Shot as long as the first action was a Standard Shot, Precision Shot, Disabling Shot, or Flush provided no costly actions were taken. 1 turn cooldown. (Note: Double Tap is cancelled in the following cases: (1) the first shot results in a kill, and no more enemies are visible to the unit, or (2) for gunners only, the first shot depletes the ammo.)

perk_executioner.name: Executioner
perk_executioner.description: Confers +10 aim and +10 critical chance against targets at or below 50% health.

perk_extra_conditioning.name: Extra Conditioning
perk_extra_conditioning.description: Confers 1-4 bonus health based on which type of armor is equipped. Heavier armor increases the bonus.

perk_field_medic.name: Field Medic
perk_field_medic.description: For soldiers, grants one free use of a medikit per mission and allows additional medikit items to be used two times per battle instead of one. Also allows Restorative Mist items to be used three times per battle instead of once.

perk_field_surgeon.name: Field Surgeon
perk_field_surgeon.description: Reduces (or, for 1 HP flesh wounds, eliminates) Wounded timer on soldiers who sustained HP damage but were not Critically Wounded. Does not affect wound sustained by sending fatigued soldier on a mission.

perk_fire_in_the_hole.name: Fire in the Hole
perk_fire_in_the_hole.description: Grants +10 aim for purposes of reducing scatter if the soldier has not moved this turn. Increases range of Blaster Launcher (which does not scatter).

perk_fire_rocket.name: Fire Rocket
perk_fire_rocket.description: Fire a high explosive rocket using an equipped launcher.

perk_flight.name: Flight
perk_flight.description: Flying units can bypass ground obstacles. They can remain in flight if they have sufficient fuel.

perk_flush.name: Flush
perk_flush.description: Fire a shot that may cause non-flying enemies to run to new cover. The shot is easy to hit with (+30 aim), but does reduced damage (-50% base weapon damage), and consumes extra ammo (2 ammo). Hunkered units will not relocate.

perk_fortiores_una.name: Fortiores Una
perk_fortiores_una.description: Nearby allies (8 tiles) receive an additional 2/3 damage reduction if they are in half cover and 1 damage reduction if they are in full cover.

perk_grenadier.name: Grenadier
perk_grenadier.description: Allows 2 destructive grenades in a single inventory slot, and the soldier may throw grenades 20 percent further.

perk_gunslinger.name: Gunslinger
perk_gunslinger.description: Confers +1 damage with sidearms and negates the long-range accuracy penalty when shooting beyond 14 meters. (Sectoids and Seekers do not gain a damage bonus from this perk.)

perk_hardened.name: Hardened
perk_hardened.description: Confers extra protection against critical hits. Enemies suffer a -60% chance to inflict critical hits.

perk_heat_ammo.name: HEAT Ammo
perk_heat_ammo.description: Your primary weapon, not including shotguns, does an additional 50% of its base weapon damage to robotic enemies after any damage reduction is assessed.

perk_heat_warheads.name: HEAT Warheads
perk_heat_warheads.description: Your rockets and grenades do an additional 50% damage to robotic enemies after damage reduction is assessed.

perk_hit_and_run.name: Hit and Run
perk_hit_and_run.description: Your first standard shot of each turn against an uncovered or flanked target does not cost an action. Does not work against flying units, and cannot be used if Run N' Gun activated.

perk_holo_targeting.name: Holo-Targeting
perk_holo_targeting.description: Shooting at or suppressing enemies confers +10 Aim to allies' attacks on those enemies until end of turn.

perk_hyper_reactive_pupils.name: Hyper-Reactive Pupils
perk_hyper_reactive_pupils.description: Confers +10 Aim on any shot after a miss.

perk_implant.name: Implant
perk_implant.description: Victims are implanted with a Chryssalid egg if they are killed by a Chryssalid's attack.

perk_in_the_zone.name: In the Zone
perk_in_the_zone.description: Killing a flanked or uncovered target does not cost an action. Confers a -1 base damage and -10% critical hit chance penalty for each successive In The Zone kill.

perk_intimidate.name: Intimidate
perk_intimidate.description: Reacts unpredictably when wounded, provoking panic in enemies.

perk_javelin_rockets.name: Javelin Rockets
perk_javelin_rockets.description: Your rockets now travel much further(+33%) and can hit targets beyond your visual range.

perk_jetboot_module.name: Jetboot Module
perk_jetboot_module.description: When activated, confers the ability to jump to normally inaccessible heights for the rest of the turn.

perk_killer_instinct.name: Killer Instinct
perk_killer_instinct.description: Activating Run and Gun grants +50% critical damage for the rest of the turn.

perk_launch.name: Launch
perk_launch.description: Move anywhere on the battlefield in a single turn. Launch cannot be used indoors.

perk_leap.name: Leap
perk_leap.description: Allows vertical leaps onto elevated surfaces during movement.

perk_light_em_up.name: Light 'Em Up
perk_light_em_up.description: Standard shots no longer end the turn, if taken as the first action.

perk_lightning_reflexes.name: Lightning Reflexes
perk_lightning_reflexes.description: The hit chance of reaction fire against this unit is reduced by 90 percent for the first shot, and by 70 percent for additional shots.

perk_lock_and_load.name: Lock N' Load
perk_lock_and_load.description: Primary weapons receive one additional shot or burst before a reload is required, and you may reload your primary weapon as the first action of your turn without ending the turn.

perk_lone_wolf.name: Lone Wolf
perk_lone_wolf.description: +10 Aim and Critical Chance if not within 7 tiles of an allied unit.

perk_low_profile.name: Low Profile
perk_low_profile.description: Makes partial cover grant the defense bonus of full cover.

perk_mayhem.name: Mayhem
perk_mayhem.description: Confers +2 damage for suppression, SAWs, LMGs, explosive grenades, proximity mines and rocket launchers. Confers +4 damage for sniper and long rifles, marksman's, strike and reflex rifles using Standard Shot or Precision Shot.

perk_mec_close_combat.name: MEC Close Combat
perk_mec_close_combat.description: Kinetic Strike no longer ends the MEC's turn, although it still costs an action. It also deals 50% more damage.

perk_melee.name: Melee
perk_melee.description: Melee units can only attack in melee.

perk_muscle_fiber_density.name: Muscle-fiber Density
perk_muscle_fiber_density.description: Confers superhuman leg strength, enabling the soldier to reach high positions without the need for ladders or other climbing aids.

perk_neural_damping.name: Neural Damping
perk_neural_damping.description: Confers +20 will when defending against Psi attacks and immunity to panic. If the soldier is mind controlled, the control is cancelled and the soldier is stunned for 1 turn instead. Neural damped soldiers cannot learn psionic skills and psionic soldiers cannot be neural damped.

perk_one_for_all.name: One For All
perk_one_for_all.description: When activated, the MEC becomes a high cover element and gains 1 Damage Reduction. Moving or using an arm-based weapon will return the MEC to standard posture.

perk_opportunist.name: Opportunist
perk_opportunist.description: Eliminates the Aim penalty on reaction shots, and allows reaction shots to cause critical hits.

perk_overload.name: Overload
perk_overload.description: Overload the unit's own power source, destroying the unit but causing explosive damage similar to a grenade's.

perk_packmaster.name: Packmaster
perk_packmaster.description: Limited-use small items (including those from perks) receive 1 additional use.

perk_paramedic.name: Paramedic
perk_paramedic.description: Once per turn, this unit may use a medikit without spending an action.

perk_platform_stability.name: Platform Stability
perk_platform_stability.description: Shots taken before any costly actions have +10 Aim and +10% critical chance. Also grants +10 aim for purposes of reducing scatter if the soldier has not moved this turn, and increases range of Blaster Launcher (which does not scatter).

perk_precision_shot.name: Precision Shot
perk_precision_shot.description: With sniper/long rifles, fire a shot that ignores squadsight critical penalties, has an additional +30% critical chance, and provides extra damage on critical hits based on the soldier's weapon tech level (+2 for ballistic/laser/gauss, +3 for pulse, +4 for plasma). With marksman's and strike rifles, allows an unlimited range shot with no other bonuses. 2 turn cooldown.

perk_ranger.name: Ranger
perk_ranger.description: Confers +1 damage with primary weapons, rocket launchers, MEC secondary weapons and sidearms. Negates the long-range accuracy penalty with sidearms when shooting beyond 14 meters.

perk_rapid_fire.name: Rapid Fire
perk_rapid_fire.description: Take two shots against a single target in quick succession. Each shot carries a -15 penalty to Aim.

perk_rapid_reaction.name: Rapid Reaction
perk_rapid_reaction.description: If on Overwatch, confers a bonus reaction shot (to a maximum three shots total) for every reaction shot that is a hit.

perk_reactive_targeting_sensors.name: Reactive Targeting Sensors
perk_reactive_targeting_sensors.description: Unit gets a free shot back at the first enemy who attacks the MEC each turn, provided there's enough ammo to do so.

perk_ready_for_anything.name: Ready for Anything
perk_ready_for_anything.description: If the unit fires without taking any other costly action, it automatically enters overwatch at the end of its turn.

perk_regen_pheromones.name: Regen Pheromones
perk_regen_pheromones.description: This unit and all nearby allies are healed for 1 health each turn.

perk_repair.name: Repair
perk_repair.description: For X-Com, grants +2 Arc Thrower charges. On drones, allows repair of robotic units.

perk_repair_servos.name: Repair Servos
perk_repair_servos.description: Repairs up to 50% of damage taken (max 2 per turn). Value on icon represents repairs remaining at 2 points per hp. Additional damage taken before repairs are complete reduces how much can be repaired.

perk_revive.name: Revive
perk_revive.description: Allows Medikits to revive critically wounded Soldiers at 33% of maximum health instead of just stabilizing them.

perk_robotic.name: Robotic
perk_robotic.description: Robotic/mechanized units are immune to psionic, acidic, and fire attacks. They are also immune to stun, panic, strangle, and implant.

perk_run_and_gun.name: Run & Gun
perk_run_and_gun.description: Allows firing or Overwatch after Dashing on the turn Run and Gun is activated. 2 turn cooldown.

perk_sapper.name: Sapper
perk_sapper.description: Increases grenade and proximity mine damage by +1. Also triples damage to the environment.

perk_savior.name: Savior
perk_savior.description: Provides 2 item-free medikit charges and +4 healing bonus to medikits. Restorative Mist units restore three more health per use.

perk_secondary_heart.name: Secondary Heart
perk_secondary_heart.description: Causes soldiers to bleed out instead of dying the first time they go to zero health in a mission. The bleed-out timer is extended by 2 turns. Prevents loss of Will from critical wounds.

perk_sentinel.name: Sentinel
perk_sentinel.description: Allows two reaction shots during Overwatch, instead of only one.

perk_sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
perk_sharpshooter.description: +10 critical chance in all situations, +10 Aim against enemies in full cover.

perk_shock_absorbent_armor.name: Shock-Absorbent Armor
perk_shock_absorbent_armor.description: Damage received from enemies within 4 tiles is reduced by 33%.

perk_shock_and_awe.name: Shock & Awe
perk_shock_and_awe.description: Allows 1 additional standard rocket to be fired per battle.

perk_shredder_ammo.name: Shredder Ammo
perk_shredder_ammo.description: The Shredder debuff causes any unit hit to take 40% additional damage (after DR, rounded down) from all sources. Gunners and MECs apply the Shredder debuff for the remainder of the current turn to any target struck by their primary weapon. Rocketeers get an extra rocket that is weaker than a standard rocket (60% rounded down), cannot penetrate cover, has a +50% larger blast radius, and applies the Shredder debuff to all targets struck by the rocket for the next 3 turns.

perk_smart_macrophages.name: Smart Macrophages
perk_smart_macrophages.description: Medikits and Restorative Mist heal 2 HP more when used on the soldier. Confers complete immunity to poison and acid.

perk_smoke_and_mirrors.name: Smoke & Mirrors
perk_smoke_and_mirrors.description: Allows one additional use of all support grenades during each mission. It also increases charges from Smoke Grenade and Battlescanner perks by 1.

perk_smoke_grenade.name: Smoke Grenade
perk_smoke_grenade.description: Deploy a smoke grenade once per mission. The smoke confers +20 defense and prevents flanking for all enemy and allied units. Lasts 2 turns. Taking the perk on level up also allows an additional action after deploying a smoke grenade.

perk_snapshot.name: Snap Shot
perk_snapshot.description: For snipers, removes the sniper rifle's restriction on firing and Overwatch after taking a costly action. Any shots taken after using any costly action suffer a -10 Aim penalty. For rocketeers, reduces the aim and range penalty for launching a rocket after taking a costly action to 25% (from 50%).

perk_squadsight.name: Squadsight
perk_squadsight.description: Allows firing at targets in any ally's sight radius within weapon range, but critical chance suffers a -20% penalty. Extended range weapons (MEC primary weapons, Marksman and Strike Rifles, and LMGs) gain roughly five extra tiles range. Sniper rifles have infinite range. Overwatch fire does not extend to squadsight ranges, except with Marksman's and Strike Rifles.

perk_steadfast.name: Steadfast
perk_steadfast.description: Never panic as a result of getting wounded, allies panicking, allies getting wounded or killed, or the intimidation ability.

perk_strangle.name: Strangle
perk_strangle.description: Strangle can be used against adjacent humans unprotected by strangle-resistant armor, items or abilities. Damage dealt doubles each turn, starting with 1 damage on the turn Strangle is used.

perk_stun_immune.name: Stun Immune
perk_stun_immune.description: This unit cannot be stunned with the Arc Thrower; taking a live specimen is not possible.

perk_suppression.name: Suppression
perk_suppression.description: Fire a barrage that pins down a target, granting Opportunist reaction fire against it if it moves. Imposes a -30 penalty to aim and reduces range of many area-of-effect attacks, including grenades. Also negates overwatch from the target while suppression is active. Lastly, enemy AI prioritizes breaking the suppression by shooting the suppressor, so it functions as a mini-taunt. Not possible with shotguns, sniper rifles, or strike rifles.

perk_tactical_sense.name: Tactical Sense
perk_tactical_sense.description: Confers +5 Defense per enemy in sight (max +20).

perk_tandem_warheads.name: Tandem Warheads
perk_tandem_warheads.description: Explosives employed by this soldier do full damage to the maximum extent of their area of effect.

perk_unlimited_cloak.name: Unlimited Cloak
perk_unlimited_cloak.description: The Seeker becomes invisible to enemies. It can use its tentacles to attack from stealth mode but it must deactivate the stealth mode to use its ranged attack.

perk_vital_point_targeting.name: Vital Point Targeting
perk_vital_point_targeting.description: Confers 2 bonus damage with primary guns, and +1 damage with sidearms, against humans and alien targets whose species have been autopsied.

perk_will_to_survive.name: Will to Survive
perk_will_to_survive.description: Gain 1.5 Damage Reduction (DR) if in cover and not flanked.
